summary: REQ-1 (replace orange background with plain white globally) appears implemented by setting the light-mode background token to pure white and explicitly forcing html/body/#root backgrounds to white. However, the diff also includes broader theme/palette changes and project metadata updates that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad redesign of global theme color palette (e.g., switching to a green/lime OKLCH palette and adjusting many non-background tokens such as primary/secondary/accent, borders, rings, destructive, etc.), beyond the requested change to remove the orange background.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to replace the orange background with plain white and ensure bg-background + base page backgrounds render white. It does not request a full theme/palette overhaul.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state metadata changes adding new feature requests (AR-1, AR-2) marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirement to modify project_state.json or add/track feature request entries.
